sentences.en: A honey tongue, a heart of gall.
Gall - blader disease and cystic fibrosis also often involve me.
sentences.cn: 胆囊疾病和胰腺囊性纤维性变也常常纠缠我.

sentences.en: He had the gall to doubt me.
sentences.cn: 他竟厚颜无耻地[胆敢]怀疑我.

sentences.en: He was ill of gall stone.
He's as bitter as gall at your desertion and its consequences: don't expect thanks for this noble devotion.
sentences.cn: 他对于你的遗弃和这后果是怨恨透啦；对于你这种高尚的爱情不要期待感谢吧。

sentences.en: I daresay he thought he was above the law. I can't get over the gall of the fellow.
sentences.cn: 我想他以为他能凌驾于法律之上，这家伙的蛮横无理真让人受不了。

sentences.en: If you have tasted the bitterness of gall , you know better the sweetness of honey.
sentences.cn: 吃过黄连苦, 更知蜜糖甜.

sentences.en: Judging from what they have done these years, they are indeed " friends " with an honey tongue and a heart of gall.
sentences.cn: 从他们这些年的所作所为看来, 他们的确是口蜜腹剑的 “ 朋友 ”.

sentences.en: Of all the gall ! ie What impudence!
She had the gall to suggest that I might supply her with information about what Steve was doing.
sentences.cn: 她竟然厚颜无耻地说或许我可以向她透露一些史蒂夫正在做的事。

sentences.en: The hormone that stimulates gall bladder contraction was called cholecystokinin.
sentences.cn: 刺激胆囊收缩的激素被称为胆囊收缩素.

sentences.en: The medicine is as bitter as gall.
Then they had the gall to complain!
sentences.cn: 而且他们居然还有脸抱怨！

sentences.en: They had the gall to attend our party without invitations.
sentences.cn: 他们竟有脸皮未经邀请就来参加我们的聚会.

sentences.en: They had the gall to call me fat!
sentences.cn: 他们竟然无礼地叫我胖子!

sentences.en: Your words must be gall and wormwood to him.
sentences.cn: 你的话在他听来一定逆耳.

难堪的；使烦恼的；擦伤人的

trans.tran_cn: 胆汁，五倍子，怨恨，苦物，苦味
trans.tran_en: anger and hate that will not go away

trans.tran_cn: 擦伤，擦破，使烦恼，侮辱，被磨损
